job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Remote eventually will have to relocate to Denver, CO or Memphis, TN

Position will be temporarily remote from home until AHS returns to office.

CandidatesMUSTbe located in the Memphis, TN area OR Denver, CO area.

Quick Notes From Interview

George Stragand - Manager of the team
  • Newer to AHS - just started 2 1/2 weeks ago
  • Lives in colorado
6 currently on the team and looking to double size

Gitlab used a lot

On call every once in a while and rotates through each team member

A lot of work within the cloud

He Asked About Security Experience

What is the owasp top 10 and which would you go after first?

What He Would Like To See

Heavy focus on the networking stuff

VPC

Networking

Routing is a bigger deal

Unicorn- someone with servicemesh experience Hashicorp is one

Istio - they're currently using

Anthos - they're currently using
